title: COMPASSION
desc: Show concern for the wellbeing of all people.

title: RESPECT
desc: Treat yourself and those around you with dignity.

title: INTEGRITY
desc: Embody strong character and moral principles.

title: BELIEF
desc: Know that you can make a positive change.

title: SELF - DISCIPLINE
desc: Focused and committed to goals, even in the face of challenges or distractions.
